mainText:
I'm baffled and speechless upon hearing the loss a great visionary Steve 
Jobs. All i can say is that Steve changed the way everyone does things 
every where they live and work and he did it better than anyone else.  I 
hope that his vision carries on at Apple so that people can live better 
lives through products that the world needs not wants. My condolences 
and blessings to all of Steve's family and friends.
header: The world has truly lost a great person
author: Joshua
